info.name: Channel_V4
info.description: The Metadata API returns metadata related to the video content provided by the SmartVideo APIs.

query.description: Page number if the results have more items than items per page. Default = 1.

The PK of the language to use, which will be a 3 character ISO 639-2 string (e.g.: fin). If this is omitted the system defined default will be used. If the requested language is not available then the system will return translations in order of the system defined preferences
Set parameter to show hidden Channels.

request.description:
* We do not support including related resources in the index view.
* **Available since:** 2020-11 (BPLAT-14148)

page number : (minimum: 1) Page number if the results have more items than items per page. Default = 1

language : The PK of the language to use, which will be a 3 character ISO 639-2 string (e.g.: fin).

show_hidden : (boolean) Set parameter to show hidden Channels.

response.name: Bad request
Successful response

request.description:
* **Available since:** 2020-11 (BPLAT-14149)

channel_id : The identifier of the channel.

language : The PK of the language to use, which will be a 3 character ISO 639-2 string (e.g.: fin).

response.name: Successful response
